testsuite.name: As a MM, I want to have the ability to include the loyallist promotion text in the mobile sequencing list

testcase.classname: As a MM, I want to have the ability to include the loyallist promotion text in the mobile sequencing list
testcase.name: Verify for a signed In user, the loyalty offer Fixed, ending date and promotion ID displayed in sequence

failure.message: failed Verify for a signed In user, the loyalty offer Fixed, ending date and promotion ID displayed in sequence

testcase.failure:
Scenario: Verify for a signed In user, the loyalty offer Fixed, ending date and promotion ID displayed in sequence
Given I am on mobile web home page And I sign in as a new user And I search for an item Then I should see the bonus offer is displayed at top of the offer page
Message:
Calling click failed: Element {:id=>"b-pdp-offers-label-top"} is not present. (Selenium::WebDriver::Error::NoSuchElementError) ./lib/utils/extensions/page-object/platforms/selenium_webdriver/surrogate_selenium_element.rb:12:in `method_missing' ./lib/utils/extensions/page-object/elements/element.rb:19:in `click' ./lib/mobile_website/pages/PDP_page.rb:152:in `loyallist_offer_badge' ./features/step_definitions/mobile_website/component_test/lbov/lbov.rb:78:in `block (2 levels) in <top (required)>' ./features/step_definitions/mobile_website/component_test/lbov/lbov.rb:77:in `/^I should see the bonus offer is displayed at top of the offer page$/' features\website\MobileFoundation\MEW\component_test\lbov\lbov_loyallist_globaloffers_text_browse.feature:9:in `Then I should see the bonus offer is displayed at top of the offer page'

testsuite.system-out: Cannot call click until element {:id=>"b-pdp-offers-label-top"} is present.
